Sentencas: Ce0.8Gd0.05Y0.15O1.9(GYDC) electrolyte was prepared by a carbonate co-precipitation method.
Titulo: Fabrication of solid oxide fuel cell based on doped ceria electrolyte by one-step sintering at 800 °C

Sentencas: Lithium nitrate at 1, 1.5, 2 and 3 mol% was added to GYDC as sintering additive.
Titulo: Fabrication of solid oxide fuel cell based on doped ceria electrolyte by one-step sintering at 800 °C

Sentencas: 96% relative density was achieved for GYDC at sintering temperature of 800 degrees C with addition of 1.5 mol% LiNO3.
Titulo: Fabrication of solid oxide fuel cell based on doped ceria electrolyte by one-step sintering at 800 °C

Sentencas: The conductivities of GYDC with sintering aids LiNO3 were measured by a.c. impedance spectroscopy and showed comparable values to that of pure GYDC sample sintered at 1400 degrees C. A single cell with 1.5 mol% LiNO3 infiltrated GYDC electrolyte was fabricated by sintering at 800 degrees C for only 2 h. Lithiated NiO was synthesized by the glycine-nitrate combustion method and employed as cathode material.
Titulo: Fabrication of solid oxide fuel cell based on doped ceria electrolyte by one-step sintering at 800 °C

Sentencas: The cell was tested at temperatures from 500 to 575 degrees C and a maximum power density of 73 mW cm(-2) was obtained at 575 degrees C.
Titulo: Fabrication of solid oxide fuel cell based on doped ceria electrolyte by one-step sintering at 800 °C

Sentencas: These preliminary results indicate that LiNO3 is a very effective sintering additive for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell fabrication.
Titulo: Fabrication of solid oxide fuel cell based on doped ceria electrolyte by one-step sintering at 800 °C
